Article1.title: Anxiety
Article1.body: Learn about anxiety and what you can do to help you feel better when you are anxious.

Article2.title: Depression
Article2.body: Learn about depression and how and what you can do to overcome depressive episodes.

Article3.title: Grounding techniques
Article3.body: Simple techniques to help you refocus.

Article4.title: Basics of a healthy diet
Article4.body: A balanced diet is crucial to maintaining good health, including mental health. Find out more about this here.

Article5.title: Calming breathing exercises
Article5.body: Easy breathing exercises that will help you relax.

Article6.title: Drugs
Article6.body: Learn about drugs of abuse and how they affect your health and life.

Article7.title: Addiction
Article7.body: People can get addicted to pretty much everything! Learn more about it and how to quit an addiction.

Article8.title: Alcohol
Article8.body: Learn about the effects of alcohol on your health and how to drink responsibly.

Article9.title: Boost your mood
Article9.body: Find some practical tips to help boost your mood.

Article10.title: Physical Exercise
Article10.body: Being physically active is also a way to take care of your mental health. Learn more about this here.

Article11.title: Sleep
Article11.body: Sleep is an essential part of our life, but it is not always easy to get enough quality sleep. Learn more here.

Article12.title: Relationships
Article12.body: A romantic relationship can be wonderful, but there can also be ups and downs. Read up on this here.

Article13.title: Self-identity
Article13.body: Read more about the concept of self-identity, peer pressure, family pressure and how to cope with them.

Article14.title: Abusive Relationships
Article14.body: Are you worried you might be in an unhealthy relationship? Get some some advice here and act quickly!
